strapiUrl.name: Strapi URL
strapiUrl.hint: URL of your Strapi server (e.g., http://localhost:1337)

jwtToken.name: JWT Key
jwtToken.hint: JWT token for authentication with Strapi (required to delete NPCs)

visibleCampaigns.name: Visible Campaigns
visibleCampaigns.hint: List of campaigns that should appear in the dropdown, separated by commas. Leave empty to show all. Example: Campaign1, Campaign2, Campaign3

panelSide.name: Panel Side
panelSide.hint: Choose which side of the screen the panel should appear on
